reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's gorgeous tropical print and vibrant colors, with one noting it covers their toes. The dress is comfortable, stretchy, and features pockets, with one customer highlighting its versatility for all body types. While some customers praise the fabric, others find it cheap and thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Love Love !!!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Dear Dress- I love you! I got this for an upcoming cruise. Gorgeous tropical print on top of a rich yellow. Material is stretchy and flowy. Will travel well without needing an iron. Always love pockets. I purchased a Large. I am 5’4” and 150 lbs. sometimes I need to push the straps up a tad. The straps are wide enough to cover bra straps. Slits on both sides makes it easy to walk. Absolutely wonderful! Read more
items.author: Keke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: I wasnt expecting nor did I obviously not pay attention for the material to be stretchy and to have pockets but I really love the dress. Its beautiful. I purchased a Medium and Im 5'7 148 lbs and its fits perfectly. I plan to purchase another one. Read more
items.author: Belinda and Raymond

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dresser
items.body: The dress was very pretty on if you are curvy. May be too big in the hips if you are straight. It does have pockets that you can somewhat see through the material that I wish we’re not there. I would say it fits true to size and is very comfortable. It is not a Rich looking material but a very cute dress on. I will keep it, but I may see if I can have the pockets sewn out. Read more
items.author: Tim Cecchin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What an awesome easy go-to dress WITH POCKETS!!!!
items.body: Adorable! Comfy! And....it has pockets ??!?!?!? What a pleasant surprise. Maybe I'll get brave enough to post a pic but a really great go-to summer fun party/event dress for sure! Read more
items.author: Codi

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute on the model, me? Not so much
items.body: Usually like pockets on my sundresses but the pockets stuck out and added a bulky look to my hips. I didn’t like the fit but the colors are amazing. Has to tie the hem in a cute knot to wear with flats, very long or maybe I’m shorter than I’d like to admit. Read more
items.author: Gorjus

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Long.
items.body: Looks very pretty on. Nice stretch. It comes to my ankles and I'm 5'5. I suggest hand wash in cold water. I machine washed in cold water and it did not wash well. Overall I do recommend . Three to four stars in my opinion. I'm considering buying another color way. I will hand wash it though. Read more
items.author: Mom@40

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering!
items.body: Love the material, so soft and flow. Colors are so vibrant. True to size. Perfect summer dress! Read more
items.author: Mar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!
items.body: This dress is extremely flattering. I don't think the pockets are necessary, but they don't detract from how it clings to your body. My only issue is that I'm short (5 ft) and it's long, so I had to hold it up when I walked. Read more
items.author: Craymond

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Blue, Yellow, A-multicolor, Tropical Multicolor, Green, Dark Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
